alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Marion and northern Lamar Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairview to 6 miles northeast of Aberdeen. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Sulligent, Detroit, Beaverton, Lamar County Airport, Weston, Crews, Gattman, Henson Springs, Shottsville, Rankin Fite Airport, Byrd, Pine Springs, Bexar, Pigeye, Marion County Public Lake and Pikeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
